name: gachara
description:
gachara is made by JoJo Lu and is available for use under the CC-BY-NC-SA license. Contact me for any usage outside of the license. This is being created as a tool for academic research in video games, however I can also foresee possible usage from DnD players, etc.

Currently under development, inquiries may be made to ejolu@live.com. gachara is a customizable character creator, documentation will be released when finished.

What's new in version:
0.1
- masculine body shape with weight and musculature options
0.15
- masculine height options added
- note: character values are randomized upon start
0.2
- shoulder options added
0.3
- feminine body shape added with all options
0.4
- face options added
- navigation bar added
0.4b
- hair options added: head, moustache, & beard
